languages.text: "Я укажу тебе путь, отче. Император не защитит тебя от гибели. Но есть силы, что смогут даровать тебе свободу от страха. Взмолись им".
"I will show you the way, Reverend. The Emperor will not protect you from death. But there are forces that can grant you freedom from fear. Pray to them. Beseech them."
languages.original_text: "Я укажу тебе путь, отче. Император не защитит тебя от гибели. Но есть силы, что смогут даровать тебе свободу от страха. Взмолись им".

traits.locale_text: "I will show you the way, Father. The Emperor will not protect you from death. But there are forces that can give you freedom from fear. Pray to them. Plead with them."
"I will show you the way, Father. The Emperor will not protect you from death. But there are forces that can give you freedom from fear. Pray to them. Plead with them."
"I will show you the way, Father. The Emperor will not protect you from death. But some forces can give you freedom from fear. Pray to them. Plead with them."
"I will show you the way, Father. The Emperor will not protect you from death. But some forces can give you freedom from fear. Pray to them. Plead with them."
"I will show you the way, Reverend. The Emperor will not protect you from death. But there are forces that can grant you freedom from fear. Pray to them. Beseech them."
"I will show you the way, Reverend. The Emperor will not protect you from death. But there are forces that can grant you freedom from fear. Pray to them. Beseech them."

languages.text: “我愿意为你指明前路，牧师。虽然帝皇无法保护你免于一死，但还有些别的力量能保护你免受恐惧之苦。向他们祈祷吧，恳求他们吧。”
languages.original_text: "I will show you the way, Reverend. The Emperor will not protect you from death. But there are forces that can grant you freedom from fear. Pray to them. Beseech them."

traits.locale_text: “我愿意为你指明前路，神父。虽然帝皇无法保护你免于一死，但还有些别的力量能保护你免受恐惧之苦。向他们祈祷吧，恳求他们吧。”

languages.text: 「道を教えてあげよう、司祭よ。皇帝はお前を死から守ってくれない。だが、恐怖からの解放を与えてくれる力もある。祈れ。懇願せよ」
languages.original_text: "I will show you the way, Reverend. The Emperor will not protect you from death. But there are forces that can grant you freedom from fear. Pray to them. Beseech them."

traits.locale_text: 「道を教えてあげよう、司祭よ。皇帝はお前を死から守ってくれない。だが、恐怖からの解放を与えてくれる力もある。祈れ。懇願せよ」

languages.text: «Le mostraré el camino, reverendo. El Emperador no le protegerá de la muerte, pero algunas fuerzas pueden liberarle del miedo. Réceles. Suplíqueles».
languages.original_text: "I will show you the way, Reverend. The Emperor will not protect you from death. But there are forces that can grant you freedom from fear. Pray to them. Beseech them."

traits.locale_text: «Le mostraré el camino, padre. El Emperador no le protegerá de la muerte, pero algunas fuerzas pueden liberarle del miedo. Réceles. Suplíqueles».

languages.text: "Ich werde Euch den Weg zeigen, Reverend. Der Imperator wird Euch nicht vor dem Tod beschützen. Doch es gibt Mächte, die Euch Freiheit von der Angst verschaffen können. Betet zu ihnen. Fleht sie an."
languages.original_text: "I will show you the way, Reverend. The Emperor will not protect you from death. But there are forces that can grant you freedom from fear. Pray to them. Beseech them."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde Euch den Weg zeigen, Vater. Der Imperator wird Euch nicht vor dem Tod beschützen. Doch einige Mächte können Euch Freiheit von der Angst verschaffen. Betet zu ihnen. Fleht sie an."

languages.text: « Je vous montrerai la voie, révérend. L'Empereur ne vous protégera pas de la mort, mais d'autres forces peuvent à tout le moins vous débarrasser de la peur. Adressez-leur vos prières. Implorez leur aide. »
languages.original_text: "I will show you the way, Reverend. The Emperor will not protect you from death. But there are forces that can grant you freedom from fear. Pray to them. Beseech them."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous montrerai la voie, mon père. L'Empereur ne vous protégera pas de la mort, mais d'autres forces peuvent à tout le moins vous débarrasser de la peur. Adressez-leur vos prières. Implorez leur aide. »

languages.text: "Sana gitmen gereken gerçek yolu göstereceğim Muhterem. İmparator seni ölümden korumayacak. Ancak seni korkudan azat edip özgürleştirebilecek güçler mevcut. Onlara dua et. Onlara yakar."
languages.original_text: "I will show you the way, Reverend. The Emperor will not protect you from death. But there are forces that can grant you freedom from fear. Pray to them. Beseech them."

traits.locale_text: "Sana gitmen gereken gerçek yolu göstereceğim Muhterem. İmparator seni ölümden korumayacak. Ancak seni korkudan azat edip özgürleştirebilecek güçler mevcut. Onlara dua et. Onlara yakar."
